title: Revive
body:
Instead of it being removed completely, perhaps it would've been more interesting to make it targeted? As in, instead of only affecting the player, one could hover over one of their allies portraits and cast revive to revive them.

Not sure if that'd make it used more at all, but it still would've been interesting imo.

replies.body: inb4 every support is forced to take revive and exhaust or risk being reported
Nah, Flash is too good to not take. :p

> [{quoted}](name=Fashion Mage,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=5beg3FsL,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-04-05T06:14:59.131+0000)
>
> Nah, Flash is too good to not take. :p

But you know how people are. They already force the guy with the lowest gold income to spend 800 gold for the ability to have three wards on the field, when they can't be bothered to spend 75 here and there or 250 for basically the same thing but better than sightstone.

They'll say something along the lines of "flash is for the carries, the support takes revive."

I agree this has high potential of pressure on the holder.

I propose revive grants the caster +75g if cast on himself.

I was reading the OP and thought, "This would be fantastic!"

Scrolled down, saw this comment, and was like, "Oh yeah... that would probably happen. Damn."
I could see this working on a support instead of exhaust if the enemy doesn't have anyone like Zed, Talon, Kha'Zix, or Kalista who needs to be exhausted

New Meta: Karthus + 5 revive team.

Well, really, it'd be any carry + 5 Revives.
